text: is an action role-playing video game series was developped and published by Nihon Falcom. The first series called Ys I: Ys Ancient Vanished was released in 1987, for NEC PC-8801. The game focused on main character named Adol Christine, the boy who finding his love. The Ys series has also into anime adaptation, based on events of first two games, and aired in early 1990s. ==Other websites== * Official Ys Website Category:Action video games Category:Video game series Category:Role-playing video games
title: Ys (franchise)
